item.title: CVE-2024-31390|2024-05-08T08:30:06.526Z -- Soflyy -- Breakdance
item.description: : Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Soflyy Breakdance allows : Code Injection.This issue affects Breakdance: from n/a through 1.7.2.
